Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD erred in rejecting the applicants' refugee claims based on fear of persecution by FARC
Evidence_Type: Threats and violence by FARC, country condition reports
Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution by FARC in Colombia
Evaluation_Standard: Serious possibility of harm, internal flight alternative (IFA)
Key_Factor_in_Determination: FARC's limited influence to rural areas, state protection in urban centers like Bogota
Application_Error: Alleged error in assessing risk in Bogota and availability of IFA
Legal_Standard: Serious possibility of harm, internal flight alternative
Application_Factor: Past persecution, geographic scope of FARC activity
Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of RPD's interpretation of country conditions and IFA
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Rule on determining refugee status with consideration of IFA and state protection
Cause_of_Refusal: No serious possibility of harm in Bogota, IFA available
Evidentiary_Issues: Assessment of evidence regarding FARC's reach and state protection
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPDâ€™s factual findings and application of law
Jurisdictional_Focus: Colombia, specifically Bogota and rural areas
Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, principles of refugee law under UN Convention
Procedural_Issue: Application of correct legal standards in refugee determination
